name: cs50w-project0
description: Project 0 for CS50w course - a static template for Pet Alert app

scripts.build:css: mkdirp dist/css && node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path styles styles/main.scss dist/css/main.css
scripts.build:images: mkdirp dist/assets && npm run build:logo && node tasks/resizeImages.js 'assets/pets/*.jpg' 'dist/assets/pets' && imagemin dist/assets/**/* --out-dir=dist/assets
